name: Miniacs: Steering Madness
description:
Out in Soft Launch: Help shape Miniacs' development by leaving us a review!

There is an entirely new, magical way to race in Miniacs: Steering Madness. Grab control of a unique motion-controlled steering wheel and let your imagination take over. You’ll feel like a puppet master, a magician, and a racing god—all at once. Compete in a number of crazy obstacle tracks and race parks that will be instantly familiar, yet somehow bigger than ever.

Battle against anybody online and invite your friends directly to join in the race and compete with up to a mob of 8 players. There are always other Miniacs to play and challenge.

Miniacs are a scrappy bunch. It’s all about the joy of victory and the thrill of beating your fellow comrades to the finish line. Rank higher and collect tabs along the way. But bragging rights is the real reward.

Get your friends (or enemies) in on a new dimension of fun today in Miniacs!
